description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Space shooter game with 3 levels 9 different ships and 2 weapons. The ships have missile count, afterburners, shield and health or energy huds. Level 3 includes a radar, planets and asteroids.
